caption.title: WNV glycosylation mutant virus growth and survivorship in American crows (AMCR).
caption.p: Seven AMCRs were inoculated with 1,500 PFU of parental WNV and mutants. Graphs represent (A) survivorship and (B) mean daily peak viremias (error bars denoted standard deviations from the mean) in log 10 PFU/mL sera. LODs are shown by dashed line.
